title: HACK THE LADDER
description: Climb the coding ladder by solving progressively harder problems. Master different programming concepts and race to the top in this thrilling challenge!

title: CHAIN FLOW
description: Solve, debug, and optimize interconnected code sets! Fix errors, ensure smooth execution, and race against time to achieve the correct final output!

title: NETWORKING
description: Troubleshoot network issues using CMD and online tools. Solve connectivity problems for a specific application and advance through this hands-on tech challenge!

title: CODECRAZE
description: Show off your coding skills in this competitive challenge! Solve tricky algorithmic problems in Java or Python, focusing on accuracy, efficiency, and logic!

title: TECH BLAST
description: Decode technical terms through visual clues! Compete in Picture Connection, Rapid Fire, and Missing Link to test quick thinking, knowledge, and teamwork!

title: TECH'O'TECH
description: An interactive, fun-packed event with three exciting rounds: Word Hunt, Guess Me, and Algorithm Pictionary. Pair up and take on this ultimate tech challenge!

title: PICK THE BID
description: A fast-paced coding quiz where teams bid for questions! Answer quickly and accuratelyâ€”whoever scores the most wins this thrilling test of programming knowledge!

title: TECH DEBATE
description: Engage in fierce debates on the hottest tech topics! From AI ethics to cybersecurity, challenge opponents, defend your stance, and prove your expertise!
